title: President Jimmy Carter to lie in state at US Capitol today
shortDescription: The remains of President Jimmy Carter will arrive in Washington today. HIs funeral is set for Thursday, also declared a National Day of Mourning.

title: Biden tells New Orleans 'you are not alone' during visit after attack
shortDescription: President Biden told a grieving New Orleans 'you are not alone' as the nation stands with the city following the deadly New Year's Day attack.

title: Lawmakers react to Trump's election certification
shortDescription: What was the mood on Capitol Hill as Donald Trump's 2024 election win was certified by Congress?

title: DOJ Trump classified documents case prosecutor steps down
shortDescription: The veteran national security prosecutor became a lightning rod for Trump criticism for his role in FBI search of Mar-a-Lago for classified documents

title: Claim about Trump facing prison time lacks context | Fact check
shortDescription: While Trump's conviction carries a maximum of four years in prison, all parties involved in his sentencing agree he will be spared jail time.

title: U.S. Army Caisson detachment prepares for President Carter lying in state at Capitol
shortDescription: The caisson detachment at Fort Myer, adjacent to Arlington National Cemetery, assumed duty to escort funerals in 1948. It followed the tradition of using a caisson, an artillery wagon, to bear the wounded and dead from the battlefront. Three, two-horse teams haul the wagon along with three riders.

title: 'Unprecedented:' Melania Trump subject of new Amazon Prime documentary
shortDescription: Future First Lady Melania Trump is the subject of a new documentary licensed for streaming by Amazon Prime Video.

title: Congress certifies Donald Trump's election win
shortDescription: Congress certified Donald Trump's 2024 election win on the four year anniversary of the January 6th attack on the Capitol.

title: Donald Trump Jr. plans Greenland visit as father's interest resurfaces
shortDescription: Donald Trump Jr. is expected to visit Greenland on Tuesday after President-elect Donald Trump said he was interested in taking control of the island.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to pause law that could ban TikTok
shortDescription: U.S President-elect Donald Trump has urged the Supreme Court to pause implementation of a law that would ban TikTok or force its sale.

title: Trump officially declared winner of 2024 presidential election
shortDescription: Four years after the Jan. 6 riot, Kamala Harris oversaw a peaceful ceremony declaring Donald Trump and JD Vance the winners of the 2024 election.

title: Biden honors Kennedy Center honorees Francis Ford Coppola, the Grateful Dead
shortDescription: President Joe Biden honored Francis Ford Coppola and members of the Grateful Dead, among others, at the 47th Kennedy Center Honors.

title: NY judge rejects Trump's request to delay hush money case sentencing
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's lawyers said they plan to appeal a New York judge's decision to schedule sentencing for Friday.

title: Biden bans new offshore oil, gas drilling along most US coasts
shortDescription: Donald Trump said he will work to immediately reverse President Biden's action to protect 625 million acres from offshore oil and gas drilling.

title: Amid storm, Speaker asks lawmakers to stay in DC to certify election
shortDescription: "I hope we have full attendance," Speaker Mike Johnson told Fox News on Sunday.
